ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Fun in Velious
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh. Since both of you said it, I m more likely to remember it when I m helping my mom do her shammy s epic. Right now I need to start on my own epic. People
ygData.messageBody:
Heh. Since both of you said it, I'm more likely to remember it when I'm
helping my mom do her shammy's epic.
Right now I need to start on my own epic. People would love me if I had a
click stick. And it would save so much mana. I swear I would rez anyone who
helped me for free forever. Oh wait, I rez most people for free anyways. I
never ask for donations for it. I just occassionaly accept donations. If the
person is a friend I refuse donation. And if it was a really easy rez or I
found the body or just offered to go do the rez without being asked I refuse
donation. Which would explain why I have no money. lol. I know, I'm not the
most aggressive or best player, but I enjoy the way I play.
luv,
-Su

> Doh
> had I read further I woulda seen that Orion already posted the invis to
> Animal thingy lol

> Halyburton

the

by...:>
